sentences.en: A goat was standing up against a tree on its hind legs, trying to get at the leaves.
sentences.cn: 一只山羊后腿撑地，搭着树站立起来，试图去够叶子。

sentences.en: Don't hind her in her studies.
sentences.cn: 不要在学业上扯她后腿.

sentences.en: For my work in South Africa I was given by Lord Hardinge a Kaiser - i - Hind Gold Medal.
sentences.cn: 哈丁勋爵还为我在南非的表现发给我一枚凯泽 - 依 - 欣德金质勋章.

sentences.en: Her hind half is very big.
sentences.cn: 她身体的后半部很肥大.

sentences.en: It's easy to say now what we should have done then — with the wisdom of hind sight!
sentences.cn: 现在说我们当时应该如何做是不难的——这全是事后聪明.

sentences.en: Suddenly the cow kicked up its hind legs.
The animal is able to stand up on its hind limbs.
sentences.cn: 这种动物能够用后肢站立.

sentences.en: The dog cocked its hind leg.
sentences.cn: 那条狗翘起了一条后腿.

sentences.en: The higher rates have been a hind-rance to economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 高利率已经成为经济复苏的障碍。

sentences.en: The hind legs of an animal are usually longer than the forelegs.
sentences.cn: 动物的后腿通常是比前腿长.

sentences.en: The horse reared up on its hind legs.
sentences.cn: 那匹马后腿前立，站了起来。

sentences.en: The horse stood on its hind legs.
sentences.cn: 那匹马用后腿站立走来.

sentences.en: The stallion upreared on its hind legs.
You would be more of a hind-rance than a help.
sentences.cn: 你帮不上忙，反倒会碍事。

trans.tran_cn: （常指动物腿）后面的，在后的，（通常与can或could连用）唠叨不停，滔滔不绝
trans.tran_en: relating to the back part of an animal with four legs

trans.tran_cn: 雌鹿，石斑鱼，<古>乡下人，<英>有经验的农场工人
